languages.text: {n}Бродяга ленивым движением достает из-под лохмотьев пистолет и направляет на вас.{/n} "Я правда должен был в это поверить? Ну-ка скажи лучше, что ты мне дашь, чтобы я тебя не прикончил за вранье?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Бродяга ленивым движением достает из-под лохмотьев пистолет и направляет на вас.{/n} "Я правда должен был в это поверить? Ну-ка скажи лучше, что ты мне дашь, чтобы я тебя не прикончил за вранье?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}The beggar lazily reaches into his rags, draws a pistol, and points it at you.{/n} "Am I s'posed to believe something as stupid as that? How about this instead? Tell me what you can give me, and maybe I won't kill you for lying to my face."
languages.original_text: {n}Бродяга ленивым движением достает из-под лохмотьев пистолет и направляет на вас.{/n} "Я правда должен был в это поверить? Ну-ка скажи лучше, что ты мне дашь, чтобы я тебя не прикончил за вранье?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The vagabond lazily reaches into his rags, draws a pistol, and points it at you.{/n} "And I'm s'posed to believe something as stupid as that? How about this instead: tell me what you can give me, and maybe I won't kill you for lying to my face."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.locale_text: {n}The vagabond lazily reaches into his rags, draws a pistol, and points it at you.{/n} "And I'm s'posed to believe something as stupid as that? How about this instead: tell me what you can give me, and maybe I won't kill you for lying to my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}The beggar lazily reaches into his rags, draws a pistol, and points it at you.{/n} "Am I s'posed to believe something as stupid as that? How about this instead? Tell me what you can give me, and maybe I won't kill you for lying to my face."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}乞食はぼろ布の中からピストルを取り出し、こちらに向ける。{/n}「そんなバカなことを信じろというのか？代わりにこれはどうだ？そうすれば、面と向かってウソをついたからといって、殺したりしないぜ」
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar lazily reaches into his rags, draws a pistol, and points it at you.{/n} "Am I s'posed to believe something as stupid as that? How about this instead? Tell me what you can give me, and maybe I won't kill you for lying to my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}乞食はぼろ布の中からピストルを取り出し、こちらに向ける。{/n}「そんなバカなことを信じろというのか？代わりにこれはどうだ？そうすれば、面と向かってウソをついたからといって、殺したりしないぜ」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}乞丐懒洋洋地把手伸进破衣服里，抽出手枪，瞄准了你。{/n}“你以为我会信这种鬼话吗？不如尝尝这个的滋味吧？和我说说，你能给我些什么？说不定我会饶你一命，不再追究你当着我的面撒谎的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar lazily reaches into his rags, draws a pistol, and points it at you.{/n} "Am I s'posed to believe something as stupid as that? How about this instead? Tell me what you can give me, and maybe I won't kill you for lying to my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}乞丐懒洋洋地把手伸进破衣服里，抽出手枪，瞄准了你。{/n}“你以为我会信这种鬼话吗？不如尝尝这个的滋味吧？和我说说，你能给我些什么？说不定我会饶你一命，不再追究你当着我的面撒谎的事情。”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}El mendigo mete la mano perezosamente en sus harapos, saca una pistola y te apunta con ella.{/n} «¿Se supone que debo creerme algo tan estúpido? ¿Qué le parece esto? Dígame qué puede ofrecerme y puede que no {mf|le|la} mate por mentirme a la cara».
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar lazily reaches into his rags, draws a pistol, and points it at you.{/n} "Am I s'posed to believe something as stupid as that? How about this instead? Tell me what you can give me, and maybe I won't kill you for lying to my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}El mendigo mete la mano perezosamente en sus harapos, saca una pistola y te apunta con ella.{/n} «¿Se supone que debo creerme algo tan estúpido? ¿Qué le parece esto? Dígame qué puede ofrecerme y puede que no {mf|le|la} mate por mentirme a la cara».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Der Bettler greift träge in seine Lumpen, zieht eine Pistole und richtet sie auf dich.{/n} "Soll ich so einen Unsinn etwa glauben? Wie wäre es stattdessen hiermit? Sagt mir, was Ihr mir geben könnt, dann töte ich Euch vielleicht nicht dafür, dass Ihr mich angelogen habt."
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar lazily reaches into his rags, draws a pistol, and points it at you.{/n} "Am I s'posed to believe something as stupid as that? How about this instead? Tell me what you can give me, and maybe I won't kill you for lying to my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Bettler greift träge in seine Lumpen, zieht eine Pistole und richtet sie auf dich.{/n} "Soll ich so einen Unsinn etwa glauben? Wie wäre es stattdessen hiermit? Sagt mir, was Ihr mir geben könnt, dann töte ich Euch vielleicht nicht dafür, dass Ihr mich angelogen habt."
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Sans même faire mine de se presser, le mutant extrait un pistolet de ses guenilles et le pointe directement sur vous.{/n} « C'est franchement l'histoire la plus stupide que j'ai jamais entendue. Vous croyez vraiment que je vais tomber dans le panneau ? Dites-moi ce que vous pouvez me filer, et peut-être que je ne vous exploserai pas la tête pour m'avoir menti. »
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar lazily reaches into his rags, draws a pistol, and points it at you.{/n} "Am I s'posed to believe something as stupid as that? How about this instead? Tell me what you can give me, and maybe I won't kill you for lying to my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sans même faire mine de se presser, le mutant extrait un pistolet de ses guenilles et le pointe directement sur vous.{/n} « C'est franchement l'histoire la plus stupide que j'ai jamais entendue. Vous croyez vraiment que je vais tomber dans le panneau ? Dites-moi ce que vous pouvez me filer, et peut-être que je ne vous exploserai pas la tête pour m'avoir menti. »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Dilenci, üzerine sarındığı paçavralara doğru yavaş yavaş uzanıyor ve tabancasını çekip sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Bu kadar aptalca bir şeye inanır mıyım? Şöyle yapsak nasıl olur? Bana ne verebileceğini söylersen bana yalan söylediğin için seni vurmam."
languages.original_text: {n}The beggar lazily reaches into his rags, draws a pistol, and points it at you.{/n} "Am I s'posed to believe something as stupid as that? How about this instead? Tell me what you can give me, and maybe I won't kill you for lying to my face."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dilenci, üzerine sarındığı bezlere doğru yavaş yavaş uzanıp tabancasını çekerek sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Bu kadar aptalca bir şeye inanmam mı lazımdı? Şöyle yapsak nasıl olur? Bana ne verebileceğini söylersen seni suratıma yalan söylediğin için vurmam."
traits.speaker: TrampMain
